name: Origami Model: Round Rummy Tum
description: Tubby combined Paimon's description of your adventures in Simulanka with her own imagination to create this incredibly adorable round little model of a chubby origami hamster. "Chubby... Who are you calling chubby? I've just got a slightly thicker layer of paper on me, that's all!" â€” Thinking back to what Grandpa Almond said the first time you met, and how strongly he objected to the word "chubby," this model might better be called "Round Rummy Tum"!
